1614470.name: God of Riffs - Official Soundtrack (Early Access)
1614470.description:
The God Of Riffs Original Soundtrack (Early Access) contains a shredding total of twelve minutes of high intensity, fast riffage and powerful sing-a-longs that will definitely get your headbanging on! It contains 4 full tracks, composed, mixed, and arranged entirely by our in-house sound team, Chris and Rory, here at Boss Music Games.

Original Soundtrack: 12 minutes of epic-filled, shredding goodness of tracks in MP3 and high-quality uncompressed WAV!
